question:
With reference to the MoU signed between Ayushman Bharat- PMJAY and Ola platform, consider the following statements:
  1. The partnership will provide health benefits to Ola’s drivers and their families.
  2. The project will be handled by the ICMR.
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Statement 1 is correct: The signing of MoU between AB-PMJAY and Ola mobility platform will provide the welfare benefits to Ola’s drivers and their families. For this purpose, AB-PMJAY cards at 30 INR will be issued. The eligible drivers and their families will be able to avail health insurance for secondary and tertiary healthcare. Statement 2 is incorrect: The project is to be handled by the National Health Authority. It is an apex body that will deal with checking the eligibility, issuing e-cards, etc. to the members. The body is responsible for implementation of the AB-PMJAY scheme. The body replaced the National health Agency in January 2019.
